text: And then this asshole Tim Geitner is the guy who Obama chose to put in charge of the economic, or the, the fiscal policy and economic - Is it monetary or fiscal policy?
Monetary policy and economic recovery in this country, this predatory psycho piece of shit like, this goes back to the thing, can't they ever get angry?
